data.name: Fallout 76 - Mechanist's Persona Bundle
data.detailed_description: Purchase 1000 (+500 Bonus!) Atoms, an in-game currency you can use in the Atomic Shop to buy new Power Armor Paint Jobs, C.A.M.P. Object Sets, and more! You will also receive bonus items - Mechanist's Outfit and Helmet, plus 6 Repair Kits. Available as a one-time purchase for a limited time.
data.about_the_game: Purchase 1000 (+500 Bonus!) Atoms, an in-game currency you can use in the Atomic Shop to buy new Power Armor Paint Jobs, C.A.M.P. Object Sets, and more! You will also receive bonus items - Mechanist's Outfit and Helmet, plus 6 Repair Kits. Available as a one-time purchase for a limited time.
data.short_description: Buy the 1000 Atoms (+500 bonus) and get the Mechanist's Outfit and Helmet, plus 6 Repair Kits. Available as a one-time purchase for a limited time.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k 3.5 GHz /AMD Ryzen 3 1300X 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB /AMD Radeon R9 285 2GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 3.6 GHz /AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB /AMD R9 290X 4GB
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
